backend/main.mo: Main backend actor implementing Bitcoin credit transfer system with balance management, transaction history, peer transfers, withdrawal requests, verification requests, admin controls, and access control using Map/List data structures.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting five implemented features for user transaction verification submission, admin verification request management, navigation links, and React Query hooks with high confidence ratings.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of frontend files including routing, verification hooks, transaction status tracking, admin pages, and UI components with detailed implementation notes.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS styles defining OKLCH color tokens for light/dark modes, transaction status colors, and custom CSS variables for the design system.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with root div and module script reference to main.tsx for the Bitcoin Credit Transfer application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React application with TanStack Router setup, QueryClient configuration, authentication guards (AuthenticatedRoute, AdminRoute), and route definitions for dashboard, send, history, admin, and verification pages.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminAccess: Admin access denial screen displaying principal ID with copy functionality, session diagnostics showing token and access control status, and retry/sign-out/home navigation actions.
Displays a loading screen while verifying admin access, showing elapsed time and the user's principal. After 10 seconds, offers retry and sign-out actions if verification is taking too long.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminTroubl: Shows a warning card when an authenticated user is not recognized as an admin, displaying their principal ID with copy functionality and a retry button. Only visible when admin check is complete and user lacks admin privileges.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoggedOutSi: Renders a centered sign-in panel for unauthenticated users with a button to initiate Internet Identity login.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Provides a button that toggles between sign-in and sign-out states, clearing query cache and admin status on logout. Handles authentication errors and prevents duplicate login attempts.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal dialog that prompts new users to enter their name for profile setup. Cannot be dismissed until a name is provided and saved.
frontend/src/components/balance/UsdEstim: Displays an estimated USD value for a given BTC amount using current BTC price, with loading states and a disclaimer about market fluctuations.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppHeader: Application header with title and login/logout button that manages authentication state and clears query cache on logout.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main layout wrapper providing header, navigation menu (when authenticated), main content area, and footer with caffeine.ai attribution. Navigation includes dashboard, send, withdraw, history, and verify transaction links.
frontend/src/components/reserve/AdminBro: Collapsible card providing troubleshooting guidance and best practices for Bitcoin transaction broadcasting issues, explaining that broadcasting uses IC HTTP outcalls to public APIs without localhost connections.
frontend/src/components/reserve/AdminRes: Placeholder card for reserve status monitoring that displays unavailable status indicators and explains that reserve monitoring requires external tools like Bitcoin Core RPC or blockchain explorers.
frontend/src/components/reserve/BitcoinC: A collapsible card component that displays a Python code snippet for querying Bitcoin Core node balance via RPC, with warnings that it must be executed externally and includes copy-to-clipboard functionality.
frontend/src/components/reserve/External: A collapsible card component showing a Python script for monitoring mining pool earnings and managing reserve transfers, with alerts emphasizing external execution requirements and security warnings about API keys.
frontend/src/components/reserve/ReserveM: A configuration panel for managing multisig reserve settings including threshold, public keys, address, and redeem script, with a warning that backend implementation is not yet complete.

A collapsible card displaying Python code for creating Bitcoin multisig addresses using Bitcoin Core, with warnings that execution must occur externally and results should be saved in the configuration panel.
frontend/src/components/transfers/bestPr: Defines a TypeScript interface and array of best practice entries for troubleshooting Bitcoin transfer issues, covering categories like connectivity (localhost access), provider timeouts, mempool congestion, and network/address format problems.
frontend/src/components/transfers/BestPr: A searchable and filterable troubleshooting guide component that auto-suggests relevant topics based on transfer failure patterns, with collapsible entries organized by category.
frontend/src/components/transfers/Broadc: A collapsible informational alert component that explains how Bitcoin transaction broadcasting works in the app, emphasizing that private keys must never be stored and that signing must be done externally while broadcasting uses IC HTTP outcalls to public blockchain APIs.
frontend/src/components/transfers/Mainne: An alert component displaying important mainnet Bitcoin transaction information including irreversibility warnings, reserve-funded fee details, confirmation time estimates, and Segwit support.
frontend/src/components/transfers/Provid: A placeholder card component for displaying blockchain provider diagnostics that currently shows a stub message indicating the backend implementation is pending.
frontend/src/components/transfers/Segwit: A card component displaying detailed Segwit transaction information including destination address, amount in sats/BTC, estimated reserve-funded fees, Segwit address type badge, and optional transaction hash with copy-to-clipboard functionality.
frontend/src/components/transfers/Transa: A card component showing Bitcoin transaction confirmation progress with a progress bar, confirmation count, estimated time remaining, transaction hash with blockchain explorer link, and completion status.

A badge component that displays the current status of a transaction based on signing status, broadcast status, and confirmation count with appropriate icons and colors (failed, confirmed, broadcasting, signed, pending).
frontend/src/components/transfers/Transf: A table component displaying transaction history with expandable rows that show detailed mainnet transaction information including status badges, amounts, timestamps, and nested components for Segwit details and confirmation progress.
frontend/src/components/transfers/Verify: File content was truncated; appears to be a dialog component for verifying transfers.
frontend/src/components/verification/Adm: React component that displays a filterable table of verification requests for admins, with actions to approve or reject requests, copy/view transaction details, and format Bitcoin amounts and timestamps.
frontend/src/components/verification/Man: React form component for manually recording Bitcoin purchases by entering a transaction ID (64-char hex) and BTC amount (up to 8 decimals), with validation and submission via the useRecordBitcoinPurchase hook.
frontend/src/components/verification/Use: React component that displays a user's verification request history in a table, showing request ID, transaction ID, amount, submission date, status badges (pending/approved/rejected), and admin comments.
frontend/src/components/verification/Ver: React component that displays a table of verified Bitcoin purchase records, showing transaction IDs, BTC amounts, verification timestamps, and the principal ID of the verifier with copy and blockchain explorer link actions.
frontend/src/components/withdrawals/Admi: A table component for admins to view, sort, and filter withdrawal requests by status (pending/paid/rejected), with actions to approve, reject, or mark requests as paid.
Admin dashboard displaying withdrawal request statistics (pending/paid/rejected counts) and the AdminWithdrawalRequestsTable, with handlers for marking requests as paid or rejected.
frontend/src/components/withdrawals/Exte: A collapsible developer reference component showing code examples for integrating external payout APIs (PayPal OAuth/Payouts and Stripe manual payouts).
frontend/src/components/withdrawals/With: Displays a user's withdrawal request history with filtering by status (all/pending/paid/rejected) using tabs and status badges.
A summary card showing the user's withdrawal request counts by status (pending/paid/rejected) with a link to request new withdrawals.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and manages the backend actor instance with Internet Identity authentication, initializing access control and invalidating dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAiReserveMonitorin: Hook managing AI reserve monitoring preference in localStorage, returning a boolean state and setter that defaults to enabled.
frontend/src/hooks/useFundedWithdrawalNo: Hook that polls for withdrawal requests every 30 seconds and displays toast notifications when requests are newly marked as paid, tracking notification state to avoid duplicates.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React hook and provider for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, identity storage, and delegation validation with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching and mutating backend data including user profiles, transactions, balances, admin status, withdrawal requests, peer transfers, Bitcoin purchases, and verification requests with automatic refetching for pending transactions.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom OKLCH color variables for light/dark themes featuring warm amber accents, transaction status colors, and financial UI component styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query client and wraps the app with InternetIdentityProvider and QueryClientProvider.
Admin page displaying administrator status, principal ID with copy functionality, account balance with USD estimate, and a list of admin capabilities.
frontend/src/pages/AdminManualVerificati: Admin page for manually recording Bitcoin purchases by verifying transaction IDs on the blockchain, with a form for new entries and a history table of verified purchases.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Admin dashboard showing overview cards for pending withdrawals, recent transactions, and reserve status, with navigation links to withdrawal management, credentials, verification, and manual verification pages.
frontend/src/pages/AdminVerificationRequ: Admin page for reviewing and processing user-submitted Bitcoin transaction verifications, displaying pending/approved/rejected counts and a table with approve/reject actions.
frontend/src/pages/AiLotteryPage.tsx: Page that generates AI-predicted lottery outcomes by attempting to fetch historical draw data from data.ny.gov, falling back to local dataset if unavailable, and displaying 3 generated number sets with confidence scores.
frontend/src/pages/BuyCreditsPage.tsx: Page for purchasing Bitcoin credits showing current balance and a placeholder for future payment integration with external providers.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Main dashboard displaying user's Bitcoin balance, withdrawal status, recent transactions, and quick action cards for sending, withdrawing, and managing credits with a custodial wallet warning.
frontend/src/pages/HistoryPage.tsx: Transaction history page showing summary statistics (total transactions, credits received/spent, mainnet status) and a detailed table of all user transactions with auto-open support for specific transfer requests.
Page displaying all approved peer-to-peer credit transfers received by the current user with sender information and copy-to-clipboard functionality.
Displays a list of approved peer-to-peer credit transfers sent by the current user, with copy-to-clipboard functionality and status badges. Shows empty state with link to send new transfers if none exist.
frontend/src/pages/PuzzleRewardsPage.tsx: Placeholder page for a puzzle rewards system that displays an alert indicating the feature is not yet implemented in the backend.
frontend/src/pages/SendBtcPage.tsx: Form page for sending Bitcoin from credit balance to any BTC address, with mainnet transaction alerts, security warnings about custodial model, and status tracking for signing/broadcasting. Includes provider diagnostics and transaction confirmation progress components.
frontend/src/pages/SendToPeerPage.tsx: Form page for transferring credits to another user via their Principal ID, with balance display, recipient validation, confirmation dialog, and USD estimate. Navigates to outgoing requests page on success.
frontend/src/pages/TransferTroubleshooti: Troubleshooting guide page for mainnet Bitcoin transactions, providing detailed diagnostics for signing issues, broadcasting problems, and best practices. Includes alerts about backend implementation status.
frontend/src/pages/UserVerifyTransaction: Form page for users to submit Bitcoin transaction IDs and amounts for admin verification to receive credits. Includes validation for txid format and amount, plus a history table of verification requests.
frontend/src/pages/WithdrawPage.tsx: React component for user withdrawal requests, allowing users to submit withdrawal requests with amount, payment method (PayPal/Stripe), and account details, then displaying a success confirmation and withdrawal history.
frontend/src/types/mainnet.ts: TypeScript type definitions for mainnet Bitcoin transactions, including signing/broadcast status enums, extended transaction interfaces with confirmation tracking, and utility types for SendBTC results and confirmation analysis.
frontend/src/utils/adminStatusCache.ts: localStorage-based caching utility for admin verification status per principal with 5-minute TTL and in-memory session tracking to ensure fresh checks on new page loads.
frontend/src/utils/errors.ts: Error normalization utility that converts various blockchain API, network, and transaction errors into user-friendly messages with specific handling for provider rejections, timeouts, rate limits, and address format issues.
frontend/src/utils/fundedNotificationSto: localStorage-backed store that tracks which withdrawal request IDs have been notified as PAID per principal to prevent duplicate notifications, with baseline initialization and cleanup functions.
frontend/src/utils/transactionStatus.ts: Utility functions for Bitcoin transaction status management including pending state detection, status message formatting, confirmation time estimation, Segwit address validation, and polling determination.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: URL parameter parsing utilities supporting both query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence for maintaining state like admin tokens across navigation and functions to clear sensitive parameters from URLs.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom color scheme using OKLCH color space, typography settings with Inter and JetBrains Mono fonts, container queries, animations for accordions, and custom shadows for a financial application UI.
project_state.json: Project state tracking file for a Bitcoin transaction verification application, documenting 6 implemented features (user verification submission, admin approval workflow, navigation links, history view, and React Query hooks) and 3 pending backend feature requests.
